title: What services do you offer for Flutter development?
desc: We provide end-to-end Flutter app development services, including UI/UX design, cross-platform mobile apps, state management solutions, API integration, and app maintenance.

title: Can you build apps for both iOS and Android?
desc: Yes! Flutter allows us to build high-performance apps that run seamlessly on both iOS and Android from a single codebase.

title: What state management solutions do you use?
desc: We specialize in Provider, Riverpod, and Bloc for state management, ensuring scalable, maintainable, and testable Flutter applications.

title: Do you integrate backend services with Flutter apps?
desc: Absolutely! We integrate Flutter apps with Firebase, REST APIs, GraphQL, and other third-party services for real-time, feature-rich applications.

title: How long does it take to develop a Flutter app?
desc: Development time depends on app complexity, features, and integrations. Typically, a medium-sized Flutter app takes 6-12 weeks from design to deployment.

title: Do you provide app maintenance and updates?
desc: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance, performance optimization, bug fixes, and updates to ensure your app remains up-to-date and smooth.
